docs.lead_paragraph: Keep the sun out of the baby's eyes. Give him cool boiled water to drink, take extra precautions in preparing and handling his food. These are some of the hot-weather hints for taking care of baby which are being given by the Henry Street Visiting Nurse Service at weekly ...

headline.main: New York's Mothers Learn Summer Care of the Baby; At Clubs Conducted Throughout the Greater City They Observe the Methods That Have Helped To Make the Season Healthful Course of Eight Weeks About Interruptions Getting the Bubble
